title: Arumukha tArakan
sahitya:
Arumukha tArakan pEraruLaip-peTriDalAm vArum cendUril avan sIraDiyaip-paTrinAl


anupallavi

  pAril tan bhaktaraip-parivODu pAlikkkum sIril tanakku vErillAda kAruNyan


caraNam    uru tuNai kOrinadum udaviDum udAran peruvinai tIrum aruL puriyum pErupakAran
kurai tIra viraivilE karuNai kUrum aNNal varai illAmal koDai vArittarum vaLLal
